stepTitle: On the following diagram, shade the following: (a) The points (x, y) such that $$|y-1| \leq \frac{1}{2}$$. (b) The points (x, y) such that $$|x+2| \leq \frac{1}{2}$$. (c) The points (x, y) such that $$|y-1| \leq \frac{1}{2}$$ and $$|x+2| \leq \frac{1}{2}$$. Does the graph correctly show the information?
